conversation.content: schreibe eine geschichte im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

's wor emol a moal en kleenes Dörfl in dor Oberlausitz, wu die Leit noch richtig dialekt schwätze. 's Dorf wor so dorfsch, keener wußt, wu´s lied. Un die Zeit, de gonze Welt wor noch in Ordnung. 

In dor kleenen Siedlung, dor wor en junges Mödel, de Liesbeth. De Liesbeth wor das hibsche Madl im Dorf, sie hatte blaue Äugn und lange blonde Hoar, de verkoum sich ab und zu mit Zöpf. Un alle kerls woarn verrückt noach der Liesbeth. Sie woar hübbsch, emmer nett, un koar n hot sie geholfen. Oar Votr war ganz schtoalz uff sie.

Aber die Liesbeth hat sich nit glei entschiedn woarn, fier wen ihrs Herzech schlagen sollt. Dorf un in de Umgebung wor wihtige Männer, wie der Schmidd, der Doktor und der Bäcker. Aber sie wuss jo nit mole, wi ihre Herzch schlawgen tete fiern gor keene.

So vergong sell Jahr auffm Jahr, bis'n Tag wo der Michel sich in das Dörfl verirrt hat. Er war a fescher junger Knob, der um dor Welt rumme gewandert und noch niemols a Dorf so schien gfunden hat wie dieses. Un vor allm, er hot de Liesbeth gesehen!

Der Michel war a uff de Suche nocho feschen Madl fiern Leben, und wie er de Liesbeth sah, do schlug a seins Herz im Halscher, as wänn'r ham gfunden hott, fier wen's schlagen soll. Na guck, do hott der Michel gewußt, ich halt fleißich um oar, un wo net lange schnacken, blos schnelle Taten, wie de Leit im Dorf su sagn.

Also kam der Michel oaf do Liesbeth zu un schwätzti zo aar wie a, "schienes Mödel, dain blaue Äugn sie glich wie da Himmel schiene Fleckn, un dain blonde Zoar raacht mich inn Schtirm. Ich steil di de froare, weeset heirate mechn?" 

Liesbeth wor erscht oa bissl baff, hätt jo keene Ahnung watt se gewintrn mutte. Dor Michel kam jo mol eben drüber und steil oir de Frage aller Fragen. Sie su a, "Michel, du klingst we op engelk woar, aber ich kenn di niema wie du rächlich bisd. Sei nit bös, ich mo möcht die hetze bestm doch ech nu ni saan."

Da drara hot der Michel in Liesbeths Äugn geguckt und aa, wo bist ma spitzbubisch: "Du Hübsche, ich geb ma Zett und zeig ar, dass ich'd richtige fier di. Un dann, wänn ich gewonnen hot dain Liebe, do kimm ich widder und frage dich nu." Die Liesbeth wor da verblüfft und zugleich dor Falln vürn Michel ziehmlich angetan. Un os di Zeit vergangen tat, os hat der Michel gwortn noh dain Zeichen: Dan des a Gefühl gewäs'n zun grooch kämpfn und koar'n fahr noh die Mädchen.

Fier Lang glücklich se beid woarn - de Liesbeth in ihrer Heimat uff dem Dorf, un der Michel äh weiter um ziehn geführn hot, ohne jetzt wirklich wissn, ob er immer zo Liesbeth zurück kehrt.
schreibe eine geschichte im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

's wor emol a moal en kleenes Dörfl in dor Oberlausitz, wu die Leit noch richtig dialekt schwätze. 's Dorf wor so dorfsch, keener wußt, wu´s lied. Un die Zeit, de gonze Welt wor noch in Ordnung. Der Dretmelierhof wor a schienes Fleckchen. Die Leit worn all ze freidlich un et gorve di de Natur.

Der Bauer Robert wor ern reichssaß auf'n Dorf. Er hatte en starke Familje un zo dem feld wo ast gut gearn. För olle Kreaturen, egal ob zwoarberntig oder vierbeentig, hatte se a offnes Herz. Nu wor di fleißig, üverti bei der Werk, und hoogt offn Hof viel Kinner. Zom vumm Arbet und Amüse fun ae Ecke und saßen em Zam untan Kirschbaum.

Aber a Schoff bu woar nit zäfri mit'm Lewe. Derzo nu lummert es ummen Hof un et glaat des berauh olles so hin. 's Oin Johr, os türlich im Sommer, in dor Nächt kom a ferro Klappn un Schleichn un stänk'n 'rumm. Wat woar nu los taugen in Dretmelierhof?

Bauer Robert wor erscht a bissl bueden un schlich sich gaans leis eraus, su wiet keene die Schoff wat vo ihm häar'n. Wie er de dor Schdurra, fing mi ersch zu verstehn, en kleen Muldaschenwur wo, üch wor ratz-fatz int Hof gekrochen. 's Schurmle sie sich durch achering Loch am Soeren un rickt sich an', dass de Schoff uffem Hof 'n bissl verbecht.

-'s Wor woll spudrig en Muldaschenwur ze gign, de Sege wor lang verbei, mocht aber alln leud beim Gucken. So kummde es vo Bauer Robert sölwer anzepacken und ging erscht go ga mr Doitr Bröder und dess Wissen hondlet.

De Muldaschenwur wor fuxs teufel Wild, dest, fer a so kleen Geschöpf, truge as n a weng schlaufer fun. So fing en nu zheime Krämer den Bauer üch erstaunt und gewüssen Weg goga. De Doitr Bröder wor'n soun schwatz'n und erhäald'n, was sei woar, si mol mett'n Mould doch zu packen, aber si geiern alln de Drasch üwer 'n Bauernhof en Schnippchen schlagen.

Ab annan Tog fing Muldaschenwur ze wiesen, dat och uhn eine 'n Schoifzer un kommendoch net immer suvo de Rüstings. Si mutte wom an de Bremms zu ziehn, dennso der Bauer Robert fing wacker' su greifen. So wo ann'er Monde aus seinem Ruhm kroch', wor's uffn Dorf lauter als schtußlich Leid üwerall.

Os di Zeit wu vurbei, do wusst all'n, der Muldaschenwur wor agafange un vörrahre. De Muldaschenwur woar dra'n relich en schwere Geschöpf, aber a Bauer Robert un sei's Familie hant unverdrossen olles in'ne Griff bekommt un ruhing zurückkehrt uf'n Hof.

Ihr Kinner hot se siksterzeit hinnerfragen und weeß mol zen do wie dieser Abend dämliche wat gewäss un wie soch dor Bauer Robbat un de Klapperatismuller noch stuermole em Zam un dor Moldesch krocherte.

conversation.content: schreibe eine geschichte im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

Es war am Huckefandag in Zittau, als dor oll Rudi nochmol so richtig angeben wollte. "Ich kumm o aus Jonsbach und dou kenne alle ålle Leit", sagte er und tronnte sich auf wie e Gack. "Das glab icke dir net", antwortete dor Günther, eine karlehaaretsche Trutzpern, "di kenne bestimmt net alle am Johanndag in Jonsbach".

"Na sig doch amol, wem du mich kennen lehrn wollst", hat Rudi prompt gesecht. "Ich för di een Bratwurst und ein kühles Blode", haargenau dor Günther. "Ok", sagte Rudi, "das is machbar".

Geschwind hat er sich uff dit Ganze einjelaasst und hat dor Günther zu etlichen of sei Kumpels in Jonsbach geführt. Se Wurst un dos Biere hatt'er bezahlt.

Als Rudi dor Günther vollgetankt hatte, hat der oll Schlaumeier endlich die Katze aus'm Sack gelassen. "Nu weeste sicher wieß ich heiß, oder?" fragte er. "Nu, nein!" wunderte sich Rudi.

"Ich hees Günther, du Gångster! Un ich komme von von hiene - aus Jonsbach selbst! Hahaha..."

Rudi fühlte sich total verarscht und lachte mit dor Runde mit, schließlich war er selbst Schuld. Aber jetzt hatte er wenigstens sei Lektion gelernt und hatte kein großes Maul mehr auf, wenn er nicht genau wusste, wovon er sprach.
Schreibe über den Hadron Collider (Sinn, Funktionsweise etc.), im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

Hehe, na das muss ich aber erstmal denken über, das hast du dir aber ausgesucht! ;)

So, na dann mach ich mich mal ran an de Buletten und schreib's im Oberlausitzer Dialekt:

Guckmol, dr Hadron-Kollider, das isses ja son Dinger, wo die Fliejer mit zeftigfache Je'schwindichkeit rumsausen, und dann gucken de Geile, wat da alles passiert un so. Eischientlich isses so e riesen Tunnel, där die Fliejer rundum sausen un abgebremst werden un so'ne Sachen. Besonders wichtig isses, dass es da ganz kleine Teilchen gibt, die sie partikle nennen, und dass man mit'n Hadron-Kollider ganz genau hingucken kann, was mit denen da passiert.

Die ganze Sache iss furchtbar wichtig, weil man dadurch viel besser die Natur verstehen kann un auch rausfindet, woher unsere Welt eigentlich kommt. So, und wenn de Geilen gucken, wat da passiert, dann entdecken die immer wieder neue Teilchen un so, die die Welt noch merkwürdiger machen, als se eh schon is'.

Kurz un knapp, der Hadron-Kollider is eine gigantische Maschine, där man dinge unteilbar kleene Teilchen kenntlich machen kann un dadurch besser verstehen kann, wie unsere Welt eigentlich funktioniert. So, wenn de noch fraggen hast, dann frag' mich ruhig!
schreibe eine geschichte im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

Der kleine Jörg war ein richtiger Wasserratte. Egal, ob es regnete oder die Sonne schien, er war immer am See oder Schwimmbad anzutreffen. Er sprang von den höchsten Sprungbrettern, tauchte so tief wie möglich und schwamm so schnell er konnte. Seine Eltern mussten ihm jedes Mal hinterherlaufen und aufpassen, dass er nicht zu waghalsig wurde.

Eines Tages hatte Jörg eine Idee. Er wollte unbedingt den Fluss entlang schwimmen und bis zur nächsten Stadt kommen. Die Erwachsenen haben gesagt, dass das viel zu gefährlich sei und er das auf keinen Fall machen könne. Aber Jörg war so sturköpfig wie ein Esel und ließ sich nicht beirren.

Also hat er sich früh am Morgen auf den Weg gemacht und ist losgeschwommen. Der Anfang war noch ganz einfach, aber je weiter er kam, desto stärker wurde die Strömung. Trotzdem hat er tapfer weitergepaddelt und alle Hindernisse überwunden.

Als er am Abend schließlich in der anderen Stadt ankam, war er so glücklich wie nie zuvor. Alle Leute haben gestaunt, wie mutig der kleine Jörg war und ihm gratuliert. Doch Jörg war sich sicher, dass er das niemals ohne seine Liebe zum Wasser und seine Entschlossenheit geschafft hätte.

Seit diesem Tag hatten Jörgs Eltern noch mehr Respekt vor seinem Mut und seiner Stärke. Und Jörg selbst hatte eine wichtige Lektion gelernt: Wenn man ans Ziel will, muss man hart arbeiten und darf niemals aufgeben. Das gilt nicht nur beim Schwimmen, sondern im ganzen Leben.
schreibe eine geschichte im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

Die Oma Liese war eine richtige Kämpfernatur. Sie hatte viele Rückschläge im Leben einstecken müssen, aber jedes Mal hat sie sich wieder hochgerappelt und weitergemacht. Eines Tages hat sie sich entschieden, noch einmal so richtig durchzustarten und sich ihren größten Traum zu erfüllen: Sie wollte einen eigenen Garten haben.

Gesagt, getan. Oma Liese hat sich auf die Suche nach einem geeigneten Stück Land gemacht und schließlich ein kleines Grundstück am Stadtrand gefunden. Es war voller Unkraut und Wildwuchs, aber sie wusste genau, dass daraus etwas Schönes werden konnte.

Also hat sie ihr ganzes Herzblut in den Garten gesteckt. Sie hat das Unkraut mühevoll rausgerupft, neue Pflanzen gesetzt und alles liebevoll gepflegt. Tag für Tag hat sie im Garten gearbeitet und sich immer neue Ideen ausgedacht, wie sie ihn noch schöner machen konnte.

Und tatsächlich: Der Garten wurde immer schöner und beliebter. Die Nachbarn kamen vorbei und bewunderten Oma Lieses Werk, die Kinder spielten im Garten und die Vögel sangen ihr Lied in den Bäumen. Oma Liese war so stolz auf das, was sie geschaffen hatte, und fühlte sich so glücklich wie schon lange nicht mehr.

Als der Sommer vorbeiging und langsam der Herbst ins Land zog, hatte sie einen Gedanken: Jetzt muss ich mich um etwas Neues kümmern. Der Garten war zwar wunderschön, aber sie wollte noch mehr aus ihrem Leben machen.

Also hat Oma Liese beschlossen, eine Schreibgruppe zu gründen. Sie hatte schon immer gern geschrieben und wollte jetzt ihre Erfahrungen und Geschichten mit anderen teilen. Und so war es auch: Die Schreibgruppe wurde ein voller Erfolg und Oma Liese hatte endlich eine neue Herausforderung gefunden.

Sie hatte es geschafft, sich selbst immer wieder neu zu erfinden und ihre Träume zu verwirklichen. Und das war das Schönste, was sie sich wünschen konnte.

conversation.content: schreibe eine geschichte im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

Der Woschbrettberg

Iechter eemol a Goschicht von dr Oberlausitz. Su a oorblich scheene Goschicht iebor eene Feedschlaachterei, dor Mooler on dor Plummer. An non kleene Deigel goobs dr hut decht nischt mir zu labern. Olle druff on dr Pinn subbersmartz. De schlutte sich alln zesumma.

Solche Gschichd is do wert, dass se wercherzählt wiert. A oorblich schöne Sommerdag woar's, onser Muutermoolick, de wonnet nuhe bei dor Feedschlaachtere uffm Berg, wollt drhum eene kleene Fier veranstaldn. Oans zwoa dräei, hooln dor Metzger ollees dorzet bei on de Stemmung stigg noch obm. Abber eener fehlt noch, on das is doch dr Plummer, ei Monng ohne Gorst.

Wos woar'n bloß los on wo feiert dor Plummer iechter deene große Fier? Do is-er auf emul bei dr Schlaachterei gewenn, hobb zwoa drei Goschwartscha schluggd on 'ch hobb dort miet de Kinner geraanzt.

"Nee, nu mou iech eerscht emoo olle maue Plummer huppen", iechter wos deit dos dr schlaue Monng? Dor Plieta, dor riwt eem drm Fierbeam. De Hut werd dodrmächt drbeidroht, "Nee, nu wird's drhinner ze schpät, 'sch muoß ver daarkn schon norhaus!", saht dor Plummer on geit nei dor Deck. 

Olle denkn sich bloß beie, sorich net raus bei deene Hofsereei. Miechel saht drbee: "'Sch will doch drhein der nu en Lobz-Gascht sein, dächt dor Schakemännerlew!" Wos dor Plummer drhainter nischt uff der Rechnung geit de Schlaachterei hiengen sich drham olle samen. Nu, Gliew drhantine war'n olle wos bos drauf on das gab eene mords Fetei. 

Do druff sagte dor Bäckermichl zom Plummer, "Ho drhäm, holste-sch aa eener, mir hosch schon wos gewinnt!" Dor Plummer do wollt 'sch denkn na-net gloobn, "Na nu mou ick drhä auf emol dor beschte gaschd sein? Na huck 'ch da." Dor Bäcker wirft aan Ford'sch, dar Gritli, dor noch ieber derichgemooldn gschwind strith. 

Wos dor Schlaachter aa ni wouß, do saht dor Bäcker zum Feedschlachter: "Do bsd scheen zwiegeschen griepen, oane geht schu hen on de ander schiebt ma nub! Ma kann nischt zene kennen!" 

Am firscht ganz still dor Miet, no ascht dr Miet dasch Lachn kräftschdi anzestiegen on dor Plieta flucht: "Hab no Ma, hab noch ne Kund um mn Dratschraum, sowos hobb 'sch noch no nä draagt! Nae naeschtmol schbrich 'sch olle miet zam on nacher schau'n moal."

On dor Moolerstätz leit olle laahn on machde goschichten uff, schiebt sei Larve uff ouleseits on saht drwie, "Guck maa noch die oarblich Molor, se laber do sie fort, Wos der Plummer, nor do drzieg'n!"

Abber doar-oam gschiechn, wescht mir dor Vertrag. Drhiem noch'n Schlachterei, dor Bäcker do kaaf, schmeesen sei Geld zue Progum, schiebt's a noch drhin, woar men'sch verschwand. Sogor dass dor Schlaater gabersche deit. 

On do is wiel drwi wor, on mien Mutter Kuddlschwa, do verstaand sich geschwand. Hamb fil drwarscht schlucken, woar mor als dr Mooler gnä Ho mer ganoch. Hobb-emol nu hen de Schpöken wad miet daahie on hauns drhein zu dr Schlaachterei drham on drwie.
schreibe eine geschichte im Oberlausitzer Dialekt

A Goschicht von dr Jitsche on dor Heenzel

Drhinter a oorblich scheener Sommertooch, woar'n dor Heenzel a dor Jitsche zom Aarwärmstoa uff de Serch gelaufn. Se wolltn a olle Mahl zu dor alte Teich, wo se sich heerschtens aplatschen on aftuurn welltn. 

Dor Heenzel war'n edlicher ginnich schlaue Kerlich, abber dor Jitsche war'n na nett olle mols dor Held bei dor Kopperei. "Sei Abberschtige", saht'n do leest dor Thomas, eene männlicher vo ussem Därfl, "Sei Abberschtige nischt geweidn, ieber deine zwei Bub'n!"

Uff'm Weeg zur Teich fund'n dr Heenzel on dor Jitsche a aorlich scheene, starke Bambel noochn Bettrl. De pfluag'n se ehno da und kimb'n aa zu dä Teich. A menj Zett doa hodde sich dor Heenzel unter een Hae a vo oanch Stäe azesehd on do hoorde noggs uffbellen anfitz'n. Derjitz'n sich dö Jitsche sei Boge aa un hull'n noch emol ho dr Hemgestung. 

Drho noochn bach, dor Heenzel on dor Jitsche nischt geweidn, das dr Farm, dr nooch dor Fischker rode wollt do ach drwoa sehscht. Oanmol nooch n ander zwoascht Seiats woar a grad zur gleiche Zeit do.

Erschtmoal hu pfietz'n se naat'n do, a hobb karrn oarblich schmooksche Kwickelebbn on jejen oane vo de Fischa mit em Bast. "Jetz hommr des uff frischer Tatl, woll'n doch mal schaun, was dehno dor Fraa vur Eericht macher", secht dor Heenzel mit sein Vargnigen. 

Dor Jitsche zittsch a man aa voller Schdoaens on noch'n Strantötzsch geschtutzd, "uff mir radn de aarm Fisch äus and Deck woarn se dor gonzen Deech doan, on mir derwen dän zom Froaschn gnießen!" Dor Heenzel on dor Jitsche lacht'n sich rieflich annflassen, wein Seiats soarn dor Fraa wärm arsch. 

"Auch wenn's ne sehlicht is, oane gestutz'n Fisch esse, woll mersch dezein", mee dor Heenzel grinsend a dor Jitsche. De wenkte zem zon Vieh, on nu hembrecht noch Trock dr Deg nischt iegentlich ze kotern, aarscht hobb'n se dr Fisk rieschschtale gezieschen för woar'n lich genau gorst.

Dor Jitsche noch seim greße Keil roch, on dodur'n dor Heenzel ho nach'm Stäedr gern manch hie miet ää. "Ieber wo seisch du hieraaloofn, gonnt doch doch ons Kobel noch zää", mee dönt dor Heenzel nooch non Beornehiner, da dann vri schdanduff.

Jetz wehr'n de Fischen bobblig, uff vo de ongen Hilsch genä tsch hie do, olleen vo dr Fischa moul aussdang. Eehno dodn de oa, noch'd em andert. Dodrch wonn se 'schendlich bis gans dooch rebeleere ho dor Mulik medor, de tona weg'n skeer on em'n Dech befreihen. 

Noalle do wärm'n a dor Jitsche on dor Heenzel drbock'n on dusselich woll'na och dr Saad, noch no dor Friem auf'm Weg zua schtriegen? Eehno woar nischt gorn iwwer no'n Hof an deet'n se juch, "Des Gemeinschaft vo de Fischa molscho sich dor Deech aa mo exer!" 

On drwie schweife, schlenderete dos drham dehno Heim, olle bersnte voll dr Fischkacht. On olle eng mir an Vergneigung drich'de jag'n och dr lang firscht Zet. Ee oarblich scheene Goschicht vo de der Oberlausitz.

conversation.content: what is the difference of mei wenti and mei guanxi

"Mei wenti" (没问题) is Mandarin Chinese for "no problem" or "no issue". It is a phrase used to express that there is no issue or difficulty with the situation. 

"Mei guanxi" (没关系) also means "no problem" or "it's okay" in Mandarin Chinese, but it is often used to indicate that there is no need to apologize or feel guilty about something. It can also mean "it doesn't matter" or "never mind". 

So, while both phrases express a lack of problem or issue, "mei guanxi" is more commonly used to relieve someone of guilt or pressure, while "mei wenti" is used to express that there is no problem or obstacle in a situation.
where can i ask for help if my keyboard directly on my window doesnt work evenbif theres no issue

If your computer keyboard is not working even though there is no issue, you may try the following steps before seeking technical assistance:

1. Make sure your keyboard is properly plugged into your computer.
2. Restart your computer to reset any software glitches that may be affecting your keyboard.
3. Check if your keyboard has a switch or button to turn it on or off, and make sure it is turned on.
4. Try plugging your keyboard into a different USB port on your computer to see if it works.
5. Try using a different keyboard to see if the problem persists.

If none of these steps work, you can seek technical assistance by contacting the manufacturer's customer support team, or taking your computer to a certified technician or repair shop. You can also try seeking help from online forums or communities where technical experts and enthusiasts provide help and support to computer users.

conversation.content: 中文习惯使用主动语态而英语则更多使用被动语态。具体含义

：

主动语态：主语是动作的执行者，强调主语的行动。

例句：小明吃了一个苹果。 (小明是主语，吃是动作的执行者)

被动语态：主语是动作的承受者，强调动作对主语的影响。

例句：一个苹果被小明吃了。 (一个苹果是主语，被吃是动作的承受者)

在英语中，被动语态常被用在科学和技术领域，报道和描述事件，以及在正式写作中表达客观事实等方面。此外，被动语态在避免感情色彩、不确定性和责任上也有作用。在中文中，主动语态则更常用于表达行动和情感，在讲述个人经历以及日常生活中等。

conversation.content: 中文语态多采用主动，而英文多采用被动

这种说法不太准确。中文和英文都有主动和被动语态，使用频率取决于具体情况和语境。

在中文中，动词通常是直接用主动形式表达，而被动语态则需要使用“被”字或“受”字等被动助动词，例如：“我吃了一个苹果”（主动），“一个苹果被我吃了”（被动）。

而在英文中，被动语态可以更自然地表达某些情况，例如强调动作的接收者或不知道动作执行者的情况，例如：“The book was written by John”（这本书是约翰写的）。

总的来说，使用主动或被动语态取决于句子中的语义和需要表达的信息，而不是与语言本身相关。
中文多是主动，而英文多是被动

这种说法仍然不太准确。虽然在英文中被动语态的使用是比中文更加普遍，但中文中同样有被动语态的表达方式。

事实上，在中文中，被动语态可以通过加“被”、“受”、“给”等助词来表达，例如：“这本书被我读了”、“他被狗咬了”。

而在英文中，主动语态也是经常使用的语态，它们在语言使用上遵循的原则并没有明显的主动或被动倾向。

因此，我们不能简单地将汉语和英语的语态概括为主动和被动的区别。每种语言都有其独特的语言结构和表达方式，而使用哪种语态在一定程度上取决于使用者想要表达的意义和信息。
中文习惯使用主动语态而英语则更多使用被动语态

这种说法有一定道理。一般来说，中文习惯使用主动语态表达句子，而英语则更多使用被动语态来表达句子。

在中文中，主动语态强调动作的执行者，例如“我打了一个篮球”；而被动语态则强调承受动作的对象，“篮球被我打了”。

而在英文中，被动语态强调动作的受事者或状态，“The apple was eaten”（这个苹果被吃了）；而主动语态则强调动作的执行者，“He ate the apple”（他吃了这个苹果）。

不过，并不是所有英文句子都需要使用被动语态，正如并不是所有中文句子都需要使用主动语态一样。使用哪种语态往往取决于语境和要表达的意义。
中文习惯使用主动语态而英语则更多使用被动语态 。将这一句话拓展

中文和英文的语言结构和语法规则各不相同，因此它们表达句子的方式也略有不同。一般来说，中文倾向于使用主动语态表达句子，而英语则更多使用被动语态来表达句子。

在中文中，主动语态通常在句子中使用，它强调动作的执行者，例如“我吃了一个苹果”；而被动语态使用相对较少，它强调的是动作的受事者或承受者，“这个苹果被我吃了”。

相比之下，英语语法规则更倾向于被动语态。被动语态的强调点通常是句子的主语是受事者，而不能直接表明动作的执行者。例如，“the cake was eaten by Tom”（蛋糕被汤姆吃掉了）；而主动语态则强调动作的执行者，“Tom ate the cake”（汤姆吃了蛋糕）。

需要注意的是，在英文中并不是所有的句子都需要使用被动语态，同样，在中文中也并非所有的句子都需要使用主动语态。使用哪种语态往往取决于句子要表达什么意思以及切合语言使用的习惯。
用英语详细阐释中文往往更习惯主动语态而英文更习惯于被动语态

It is generally true that Chinese tends to use active voice while English often uses passive voice.

In Chinese, active voice is commonly used to emphasize the subject of the sentence and the action they take, such as "我吃了一个苹果" (I ate an apple). Passive voice, on the other hand, is less commonly used and emphasizes the object of the sentence being affected, such as "这个苹果被我吃了" (This apple was eaten by me).

In English, the use of passive voice is more common than in Chinese. Passive voice emphasizes the subject being affected by the action rather than the person who did the action, such as "The apple was eaten by me" or "The book was written by Jane". However, this does not mean that active voice is not used in English at all. Active voice emphasizes the person performing the action, such as "I ate the apple" or "Jane wrote the book".

It should be noted that the use of active or passive voice in a language depends on the context and meaning of the sentence. While it is generally more common for Chinese to use active voice and for English to use passive voice, there are certainly cases in which the opposite is true, and there are many nuanced ways to express ideas in both languages.
用英文阐释功能对等理论中的句法对等的具体含义

Functional equivalence theory is a translation theory that emphasizes the importance of conveying the same communicative function or message of a source text in the target text, rather than focusing solely on formal or linguistic aspects of the text. One key aspect of achieving functional equivalence is through syntactic equivalence, or preserving the structure and word order of the original text in translation.

Syntactic equivalence means that the grammatical structure and word order of the target text should be as close as possible to the structure and word order of the source text. This ensures that the original meaning and message of the source text are conveyed accurately in the target text, while also ensuring that the target text is grammatically correct in the target language. Syntactic equivalence can be achieved through various translation techniques, such as direct translation, restructuring, and transposition.

It should be noted, however, that achieving syntactic equivalence alone is not enough to achieve functional equivalence. Other aspects of the text, such as style, tone, and cultural references, must also be taken into account to ensure that the intended message and communicative function of the source text is conveyed accurately in the target text.

SL:John Lewis, of Blackburn, has been crowned King of Referees
TL:布莱克本的约翰·刘易斯被冠为“裁判员之王”  分析这个句子

这个句子是一个翻译的例子，从英语翻译成了中文。

原文中SL的句子是一个被动语态，表示一个人已经被授予了“裁判员之王”的称号。而在中文翻译中，这个被动语态被转换成了主动语态，使用了动词“被冠为”。

这个翻译的结果整体上比较准确，但并没有使用人名的全称 "John Lewis"，而是使用了 "of Blackburn" 表示 John Lewis 来自英国的布莱克本镇。此外，"King of Referees" 翻译成了“裁判员之王”，这是一个比较合适的直译，能够传递原始信息。

总的来说，这个翻译结果比较流畅，英文原句的信息也被准确地传达了过来，但是在一些细微处的表达上有一些改进的余地。

SL:John Lewis, of Blackburn, has been crowned King of Referees
TL:布莱克本的约翰·刘易斯被冠为“裁判员之王” 用英文分析这个句子

The original sentence in SL is in the passive voice and indicates that John Lewis has been given the title of "King of Referees" and that he comes from Blackburn.

In the translation, the passive voice has been changed to active voice, and the verb "冠为" has been used to indicate that John Lewis has been conferred with the title of "裁判员之王". The translation also specifies that John Lewis is from Blackburn.

Overall, the translation accurately conveys the meaning of the original sentence, but some minor improvements could be made in phrasing and expression.
布莱克本的约翰·刘易斯被冠为“裁判员之王。这个句子中的被冠为  是主动语态还是被动语态
在这个句子中，“被冠为”是被动语态。实际上，这个句子可以改写成“裁判员们冠以布莱克本的约翰·刘易斯为‘裁判员之王’”，这样就是主动语态了。但是，原始的句子中使用了被动语态，表示这个称号是被授予给约翰·刘易斯的。由此，可以看出中文和英文在语态上的差异。
用英文翻译以下句子。所以在我们进行中英文语态翻译的时候，一定要注意如何更流畅的用目标语言而不是一味死板的认为英文的被动语态就应翻译为中文的主动语态

Therefore, when translating between Chinese and English, it is important to pay attention to how to use the target language more fluently, rather than simply assuming that the passive voice in English should always be translated as the active voice in Chinese.
用英文翻译以下句子。通过这个句子，我们可以发现日常中还是有一些例子和我们所学的不太一样。
Through this sentence, we can see that there are still some examples in daily life that are different from what we have learned.

conversation.content: 我需要翻译一份Android架构相关的技术文档, 从英文翻译成中文. 我会将内容以分段的形式发给你, 你将每一段的翻译结果告诉我. 如果我发现有不准确的地方,或者是一些术语需要纠正,我会告知你
好的，请发给我文档。

Overview
Modularization is the practice of breaking the concept of a monolithic, one-module codebase into loosely coupled, self contained modules.

概述
模块化是一种将单一模块代码库的概念分解为松耦合、自包含模块的实践。

Modularization learning journey
In this learning journey you will learn about modularization, and the modularization strategy used to create the modules in the Now in Android app.

模块化学习之旅
在这个学习之旅中，您将学习模块化和用于创建Now in Android应用程序中的模块的模块化策略。

Benefits of modularization
This offers many benefits, including:

Scalability - In a tightly coupled codebase, a single change can trigger a cascade of alterations. A properly modularized project will embrace the separation of concerns principle. This in turn empowers the contributors with more autonomy while also enforcing architectural patterns.

Enabling work in parallel - Modularization helps decrease version control conflicts and enables more efficient work in parallel for developers in larger teams.

Ownership - A module can have a dedicated owner who is responsible for maintaining the code and tests, fixing bugs, and reviewing changes.

Encapsulation - Isolated code is easier to read, understand, test and maintain.

Reduced build time - Leveraging Gradle’s parallel and incremental build can reduce build times.

Dynamic delivery - Modularization is a requirement for Play Feature Delivery which allows certain features of your app to be delivered conditionally or downloaded on demand.

Reusability - Proper modularization enables opportunities for code sharing and building multiple apps, across different platforms, from the same foundation.

模块化的好处
这带来了许多好处，包括：

可扩展性 - 在紧密耦合的代码库中，单个更改可能会触发一系列的改变。适当模块化的项目将拥抱关注点分离原则。这反过来赋予了贡献者更多的自主权，同时也强制执行架构模式。

并行工作 - 模块化有助于减少版本控制冲突，并使开发人员在更大的团队中能够更有效地并行工作。

拥有权 - 模块可以有专门的所有者，负责维护代码和测试、修复错误和审查更改。

封装性 - 隔离的代码更易于阅读、理解、测试和维护。

减少构建时间 - 利用Gradle的并行和增量构建可以减少构建时间。

动态交付 - 模块化是Play特征交付的要求，它允许将应用程序的某些特征在特定条件下交付或按需下载。

可重用性 - 适当的模块化使共享代码的机会成为可能，并可以从相同的基础构建多个应用程序，跨不同平台。

Ownership 应该翻译为 所有权
Isolated code 意思是 孤立的代码
Play Feature Delivery 是一个专有术语, 不需要翻译
如果后续出现这些单词, 请注意区分
谢谢您的指导，我会注意到这些术语的使用，以确保正确的翻译。

Modularization pitfalls
However, modularization is a pattern that can be misused, and there are some gotchas to be aware of when modularizing an app:

Too many modules - each module has an overhead that comes in the form of increased complexity of the build configuration. This can cause Gradle sync times to increase, and incurs an ongoing maintenance cost. In addition, adding more modules increases the complexity of the project’s Gradle setup, when compared to a single monolithic module. This can be mitigated by making use of convention plugins, to extract reusable and composable build configuration into type-safe Kotlin code. In the Now in Android app, these convention plugins can be found in the build-logic folder.

Not enough modules - conversely if your modules are few, large and tightly coupled, you end up with yet another monolith. This means you lose some benefits of modularization. If your module is bloated and has no single, well defined purpose, you should consider splitting it.

Too complex - there is no silver bullet here. In fact it doesn’t always make sense to modularize your project. A dominating factor is the size and relative complexity of the codebase. If your project is not expected to grow beyond a certain threshold, the scalability and build time gains won’t apply.

模块化的陷阱
然而，模块化是一种可以被误用的模式，当进行应用程序的模块化时，需要注意以下注意事项：

模块过多 - 每个模块都有一个开销，以增加构建配置的复杂性的形式呈现。这可能会导致Gradle同步时间增加，并产生持续的维护成本。此外，增加更多的模块会增加项目的Gradle设置的复杂性，与单一的单块模块相比。可以通过利用规范插件，将可重用和可组合的构建配置提取为类型安全的Kotlin代码，从而减轻这种问题。在Now in Android应用程序中，这些规范插件可以在build-logic文件夹中找到。

模块过少 - 相反，如果您的模块很少，但很大且紧密耦合，最终还是得到另一个单块。这意味着您会失去一些模块化的好处。如果您的模块膨胀并且没有单一的、明确定义的目的，您应该考虑拆分它。

过于复杂 - 这里没有银弹。事实上，并不总是有意义对您的项目进行模块化。占主导地位的因素是代码库的大小和相对复杂性。如果您的项目不会超过某个阈值，那么可扩展性和构建时间的收益就不会发挥作用。

Modularization strategy
It’s important to note that there is no single modularization strategy that fits all projects. However, there are general guidelines that can be followed to ensure you maximize its benefits and minimize its downsides.

A barebone module is simply a directory with a Gradle build script inside. Usually though, a module will consist of one or more source sets and possibly a collection of resources or assets. Modules can be built and tested independently. Due to Gradle's flexibility there are few constraints as to how you can organize your project. In general, you should strive for low coupling and high cohesion.

Low coupling - Modules should be as independent as possible from one another, so that changes to one module have zero or minimal impact on other modules. They should not possess knowledge of the inner workings of other modules.

High cohesion - A module should comprise a collection of code that acts as a system. It should have clearly defined responsibilities and stay within boundaries of certain domain knowledge. For example, the core:network module in Now in Android is responsible for making network requests, handling responses from a remote data source, and supplying data to other modules.

模块化策略
重要的是要注意到，没有单一的模块化策略适用于所有项目。然而，有一些通用的指导方针可以遵循，以确保您最大化其好处并最小化其不利因素。

一个净模块仅仅是一个包含Gradle构建脚本的目录。通常，模块将由一个或多个源设置和可能的一组资源或资产组成。模块可以单独构建和测试。由于Gradle的灵活性，几乎没有限制可以如何组织您的项目。通常来说，应该追求低耦合和高内聚。

低耦合 - 模块应该尽可能独立，这样对一个模块的更改就对其他模块没有或只有最小的影响。它们不应该拥有其他模块内部工作的知识。

高内聚 - 一个模块应该由作为系统的代码集合组成。它应该具有明确的职责，并在某些领域知识的边界内。例如，在Now in Android中，核心:网络模块负责进行网络请求，处理从远程数据源返回的响应，并向其他模块提供数据。

Types of modules in Now in Android

Top tip: A module graph (shown above) can be useful during modularization planning for visualizing dependencies between modules.

The Now in Android app contains the following types of modules:

The app module - contains app level and scaffolding classes that bind the rest of the codebase, such as MainActivity, NiaApp and app-level controlled navigation. A good example of this is the navigation setup through NiaNavHost and the bottom navigation bar setup through NiaTopLevelNavigation. The app module depends on all feature modules and required core modules.

feature: modules - feature specific modules which are scoped to handle a single responsibility in the app. These modules can be reused by any app, including test or other flavoured apps, when needed, while still keeping it separated and isolated. If a class is needed only by one feature module, it should remain within that module. If not, it should be extracted into an appropriate core module. A feature module should have no dependencies on other feature modules. They only depend on the core modules that they require.

core: modules - common library modules containing auxiliary code and specific dependencies that need to be shared between other modules in the app. These modules can depend on other core modules, but they shouldn’t depend on feature nor app modules.

Miscellaneous modules - such as sync, benchmark and test modules, as well as app-nia-catalog - a catalog app for displaying our design system quickly.

现在在Android中的模块类型

顶部提示: 模块图（如上所示）可以在模块化计划中可视化模块之间的依赖关系时非常有用。

现在在Android应用程序包含以下类型的模块：

应用程序模块 - 包含应用程序级别和搭建类，将其余的代码库绑定在一起，例如MainActivity、NiaApp和应用程序级别的控制导航。一个很好的例子是通过NiaNavHost进行导航设置，通过NiaTopLevelNavigation进行底部导航栏设置。应用程序模块依赖于所有功能模块和所需的核心模块。

功能模块 - 专门处理应用程序中的单个功能责任的模块。当需要时，这些模块可以被任何应用程序重用，包括测试或其他flavoured应用程序，同时仍然保持分隔和隔离。如果一个类只被一个功能模块需要，那它应该保留在该模块中。如果不是，它应该提取到一个适当的核心模块中。功能模块不应该依赖于其他功能模块。它们只取决于它们所需的核心模块。

核心模块 - 包含辅助代码和需要在应用程序的其他模块之间共享的特定依赖关系的通用库模块。这些模块可以依赖于其他核心模块，但不应该依赖于功能或应用程序模块。

其他模块 - 例如同步、基准和测试模块，以及app-nia-catalog - 用于快速显示我们的设计系统的目录应用程序。
请注意 Now in Android 是这个项目的名称,不应该进行翻译
谢谢您的提醒，我会注意不翻译该项目名称。

Modularization in Now in Android
Our modularization approach was defined taking into account the “Now in Android” project roadmap, upcoming work and new features. Additionally, our aim this time around was to find the right balance between overmodularizing a relatively small app and using this opportunity to showcase a modularization pattern fit for a much larger codebase, closer to real world apps in production environments.

在Now in Android中的模块化
我们的模块化方法是考虑到“Now in Android”项目的路线图、即将到来的工作和新功能而定义的。此外，这一次我们的目标是在过度模块化一个相对较小的应用程序和利用这个机会展示适用于更大的代码库的模块化模式之间找到平衡，更接近于生产环境中的真实应用程序。

This approach was discussed with the Android community, and evolved taking their feedback into account. With modularization however, there isn’t one right answer that makes all others wrong. Ultimately, there are many ways and approaches to modularizing an app and rarely does one approach fit all purposes, codebases and team preferences. This is why planning beforehand and taking into account all goals, problems you’re trying to solve, future work and predicting potential stepping stones are all crucial steps for defining the best fit structure under your own, unique circumstances. Developers can benefit from a brainstorming session to draw out a graph of modules and dependencies to visualize and plan this better.

这种方法与Android社区进行了讨论，并在考虑他们的反馈意见的基础上得到了发展。然而，对于模块化来说，并没有一种正确的答案能够否认其他所有答案。最终，有许多方法和方法来模块化一个应用程序，很少有一种方法适用于所有目的、代码库和团队偏好。这就是为什么事先规划并考虑所有目标、要解决的问题、未来的工作和预测潜在的障碍都是定义最合适结构的关键步骤，在自己独特的情况下。开发人员可以通过脑力风暴会议来绘制模块和依赖关系图表，以更好地可视化和规划。

Our approach is such an example - we don’t expect it to be an unchangeable structure applicable to all cases, and in fact, it could evolve and change in the future. It’s a general guideline we found to be the best fit for our project and offer it as one example you can further modify, expand and build on top of. One way of doing this would be to increase the granularity of the codebase even more. Granularity is the extent to which your codebase is composed of modules. If your data layer is small, it’s fine to keep it in a single module. But once the number of repositories and data sources starts to grow, it might be worth considering splitting them into separate modules.

我们的方法就是一个例子 - 我们并不希望它成为所有情况下都适用的不可改变的结构，实际上，它可能会在未来发展和改变。这是我们发现适用于我们项目的最佳模板，我们将其作为示例呈现出来，您可以进一步修改、扩展和构建。其中一种方式是进一步增加代码库的粒度。粒度是您的代码库由模块组成的程度。如果数据层较小，则可以将其保留在单个模块中。但是，一旦存储库和数据源的数量开始增加，就可能值得考虑将它们拆分为单独的模块。

conversation.content: 英译中时翻译长难句的时候，应该用哪些方法翻译

英译中时翻译长难句，一些常用的方法包括：

1. 拆分句子，将长句分解成多个简单的句子，以便更好地理解和翻译。

2. 解析语法结构，找出句子的主语、谓语和宾语等成分，确定各个成分在句子中的关系。

3. 使用较为简单的句式，将长难句重构成一些简明的句子，以更清晰地表达含义。

4. 参考上下文，了解句子的背景和语境，有助于理解和翻译复杂的句子。

5. 寻找并运用相关的词汇、惯用语和短语来翻译，可以准确表达句子的意思，增强翻译的流畅度和自然度。

6. 根据目标语言的语言习惯和表述方式，在语法和结构上进行调整，使翻译更具可读性和可理解性。
将上一楼的答案翻译为英文

When translating long and complicated sentences from English to Chinese, some commonly used methods include: 

1. Breaking down the sentence into simpler sentences to better understand and translate it. 

2. Analyzing the sentence's grammatical structure and identifying the subject, predicate, and object components to determine their relationships in the sentence. 

3. Using simpler sentence structures to reconstruct the long and complicated sentence to more clearly express its meaning. 

4. Referring to the surrounding context to understand the background and context of the sentence to help understand and translate the complex sentence. 

5. Finding and using relevant vocabulary, idioms, and phrases in the target language to accurately express the meaning of the sentence and enhance the fluency and naturalness of the translation. 

6. Adjusting the grammar and structure in the target language according to its language habits and expression methods to make the translation more readable and understandable.
英译中时翻译长难句的时候，应该注意什么

英译中时翻译长难句，应该注意以下事项：

1. 语言表达的准确性：翻译应尽可能准确地表达原文的含义，不能衍生出新的意思。

2. 语言表达的自然度：翻译不要只追求准确性而破坏语言的自然度和流畅度。

3. 上下文的了解：应该了解文章或句子所处的语境和背景，以便在翻译时恰当处理语言表达。

4. 语言风格的处理：应该把握作者的语言风格，尽可能保留原文的语言特色和风格。

5. 语法和词汇的惯用法：要遵循目标语言的语法习惯和词汇使用习惯，以保证翻译的易懂性和自然度。

6. 理解上下文中的专有名词和术语：对专业领域的术语和专有名词要有充分的理解和掌握，确保翻译的准确性和专业性。

7. 依据语言目的的不同，对句子结构进行适当修改，以在不违背原文语义的前提下，让翻译更容易被本地读者接受和理解。
将上一楼的答案翻译为英文

When translating long and complicated sentences from English to Chinese, attention should be paid to the following aspects:

1. Accuracy in language expression: The translation should accurately convey the meaning of the original text without creating new meanings.

2. Naturalness in language expression: The translation should not sacrifice the naturalness and fluency of the language for the sake of accuracy only.

3. Understanding the context: The context and background of the article or sentence should be understood to correctly handle language expression during translation.

4. Handling of language style: The language style of the author should be grasped to preserve the original language features and style as much as possible.

5. Use of rules for grammar and vocabulary: The rules for grammar and vocabulary use in the target language should be followed to ensure the comprehensibility and naturalness of the translation.

6. Understanding proper nouns and terminology in context: Understanding and mastering terminology and proper nouns in professional fields, ensuring the accuracy and professionalism of the translation.

7. Depending on the language purpose, the sentence structure can be modified appropriately, allowing the translation to be more easily accepted and understood by native readers, without violating the semantic meaning of the original text.
中文句子和英文句子的区别

中文句子和英文句子在语法、结构和表达方式上存在一些区别。

1.词序：中文中通常是主语+谓语+宾语的顺序，而英文中通常是主语+宾语+谓语的顺序。

2.语法：中文相对来说比较灵活，语序、时态、语气等常常是通过词语的组合和使用来表示的。而英文则相对规范，更注重时态、语气、主谓一致和语法规则的使用。

3.标点：中文标点较为丰富，如逗号、顿号、句号、问号、感叹号等，通常用于划分句子成分和表达语气。而英文则使用的标点相对较简单，如逗号、句号、问号、感叹号等。

4.动词形态：中文动词没有时态、数和人称的变化，变化主要通过副词和时间状语等词语来表示。而英文动词的变化较为丰富，包括时态、数和人称等。

5.表达方式：中文表达方式通常比较含蓄，善于使用比喻、象征和暗示等修辞手法。而英文表达方式则相对直接，更注重客观和逻辑性。

6.词汇的使用和构词：中文的词汇来源丰富，包括汉字、词组、典故等，构词方式也灵活多样。而英文来自于不同的语言，并且有较多的外来词，构词则通常采用添加前缀、后缀或派生等方式。

conversations.facetValue: learn about the differences between statistical machine translation and neural machine translation, specifically regarding their technical aspects and performance.

allFacetValues.value: learn about the differences between statistical machine translation and neural machine translation, specifically regarding their technical aspects and performance.
English

conversation.content: How does statistical machine translation differ technically from artificial neural network machine translation? Which one works better?

Statistical Machine Translation (SMT) and Artificial Neural Network Machine Translation (often called Neural Machine Translation, or NMT) are two approaches to machine translation, trying to convert text from one language to another automatically.

Statistical Machine Translation is based on statistical models that rely on bilingual data. These models learn to map words or phrases from one language to another based on the frequency and co-occurrence of words and phrases. SMT often involves breaking down the text into phrases or smaller chunks and then using probabilistic techniques to determine the best translation. SMT systems use a combination of translation models and language models to generate translations. The biggest limitation of SMT is that it cannot capture long-range dependencies and contextual knowledge well, which may result in poor translations.

On the other hand, Neural Machine Translation leverages deep learning techniques and employs artificial neural networks, particularly recurrent neural networks (RNNs) or more advanced models like Transformer, to translate text. NMT models learn continuous representations of words and phrases in a more holistic, context-aware manner. Unlike SMT, which breaks down sentences into smaller chunks, NMT processes the entire input source sentence and outputs a target sentence. This enables NMT systems to learn more accurate translations and better capture long-range dependencies and contextual knowledge.

NMT is generally considered to work better than SMT in terms of translation quality, fluency, and contextual understanding. NMT has surpassed SMT in many benchmark evaluation tasks and is now the dominant approach used in state-of-the-art machine translation systems. However, NMT can also require more computational power and resources to train and apply, especially for large-scale translation tasks.
How different technically is Neural Machine Translation from language models such as GPT-3?

Neural Machine Translation (NMT) and language models like GPT-3 both use artificial neural networks to process natural language. However, they're designed for different tasks and have some significant technical differences.

1. Objective: NMT is designed specifically for translating text from one language to another. In contrast, GPT-3 is a more general-purpose language model that can perform multiple tasks, such as text completion, summarization, question-answering, and even machine translation. It can be fine-tuned to achieve better performance in specific domains or tasks, including translation.

2. Architecture: Earlier NMT models primarily used Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs), such as LSTMs (Long Short-Term Memory) or GRUs (Gated Recurrent Units). More recent NMT models, such as the Transformer architecture, use self-attention mechanisms and have become the dominant choice for NMT. GPT-3, on the other hand, is based on the Transformer architecture and relies heavily on self-attention mechanisms for efficient and scalable sequence processing. It is larger in terms of model size and the number of parameters, with up to 175 billion parameters in its largest version.

3. Training data: NMT requires parallel corpora (datasets containing pairs of texts in the source and target languages) for training. The model learns the mapping between the languages based on these text pairs. GPT-3 is trained using unsupervised learning on a large amount of text data without specific input-output pairs. It is fine-tuned on diverse tasks using smaller, supervised datasets.

4. Output generation: NMT models, like the Transformer architecture, use an encoder-decoder framework, where the encoder processes the input language, and the decoder generates the output in the target language. For GPT-3, output generation typically proceeds autoregressively or using the context provided in the given input to complete, reassemble, or generate appropriate responses.

5. Language pairs: NMT models are usually trained to translate between specific language pairs, requiring separate models for different source and target languages. GPT-3 can handle multiple languages due to its extensive training data and multi-task learning capabilities, although it may not be as accurate as specialized translation models.

In summary, Neural Machine Translation focuses specifically on translation tasks, while GPT-3 is a more general language model with a broad range of applications. Technically, they share some similar components, such as the use of the Transformer architecture, but the training data, architecture size, and output generation methods differ.

conversation.content: how does stress pronouns in french work?

Stress pronouns in French are used to emphasize a subject, object or complement in a sentence. The stress pronouns in French are: moi (me), toi (you), lui (him/it), elle (her/it), nous (us), vous (you all), eux (them-masculine), elles (them-feminine).

Here are some examples of how stress pronouns work in French:

1. Je parle français. (I speak French.)
Moi, je parle français. (As for me, I speak French.)

2. Tu me donnes la clé. (You give me the key.)
Toi, tu me donnes la clé. (You, you give me the key.)

3. Il mange la pomme. (He is eating the apple.)
Lui, il mange la pomme. (Him, he is eating the apple.)

4. Nous allons au cinéma. (We are going to the cinema.)
Nous, nous allons au cinéma. (We, we are going to the cinema.)

5. Vous habitez à Paris. (You live in Paris.)
Vous, vous habitez à Paris. (You all, you live in Paris.)

6. Les filles lisent un livre. (The girls are reading a book.)
Elles, elles lisent un livre. (They-feminine, they are reading a book.)

7. Les garçons jouent au foot. (The boys are playing soccer.)
Eux, ils jouent au foot. (They-masculine, they are playing soccer.)

Note: Stress pronouns in French are always used after prepositions like à, avec, chez, de, pour, sans, sur, etc.

list these ideas from john locke that influenced americas founding:

social contract

natural rights

Consent of the governed

Limited government

Right to revolt

summarize each prompt in two sentences

1. Social Contract - The social contract theory was introduced by John Locke, which is the agreement between the government and the governed. According to Locke, the government's role is to protect people's natural rights, and people must obey the law to preserve social order.

2. Natural Rights - John Locke believed in natural rights, which are rights that every individual is born with and cannot be taken away by the government. These natural rights include life, liberty, and property, which became an important part of American political ideology.

3. Consent of the governed - Locke believed that the government's legitimacy comes from the consent of the governed. In other words, people must give their approval to the government to rule, and if they are not satisfied, they have the right to change it.

4. Limited Government - Locke's idea of limited government meant that the government's power should be confined to specific areas, and it should not be arbitrary or oppressive. This idea was instrumental in the development of the American political system, which has a system of checks and balances.

5. Right to Revolt - According to Locke, people have the right to revolt against their government if it fails to protect their natural rights. This idea was influential in the American Revolution, which led to the formation of an independent country based on democratic principles.
what was the structure/weaknesses of the articles of Confederation? summarize in bullet points

Structure:

- The Articles of Confederation established a system of government where the states were more powerful than the central government.
- The central government consisted of a unicameral legislature called the Continental Congress.
- Each state had one vote in the Continental Congress, regardless of its size or population.
- The Continental Congress had limited powers, which included declaring war, making peace, negotiating with foreign countries, and managing relations with Native American tribes.
- There was no executive or judicial branch of government.

Weaknesses:

- The government lacked the power to enforce laws or regulate commerce between the states and with foreign countries.
- The central government didn't have the power to collect taxes, and it was entirely dependent on the states for financial support.
- The Continental Congress had no power to draft soldiers or regulate the military, which made it challenging to defend the nation.
- There was no national court system to hear and decide disputes between the states.
- Amendments to the Articles required the unanimous agreement of all thirteen states, making it almost impossible to change the system of government.
- The weakness of the central government led to a lack of unity among the states and conflicts over trade, boundaries, and other issues. The system was replaced by the U.S. Constitution in 1787, which established a more powerful and centralized government.
civil liberties vs civil rights similarities and differences

Similarities:

1. Both civil liberties and civil rights refer to a set of rights and freedoms that are guaranteed to citizens by law.
2. Both are important components of democratic societies, ensuring that individuals are treated fairly and equally.
3. Both are listed in the United States Constitution and have been interpreted and enforced by the judiciary.

Differences:

1. Civil liberties are the individual rights that are protected from encroachment by the government, such as freedom of speech, religion, and the press. Civil rights, on the other hand, refer to the laws enacted to protect the rights of individuals by prohibiting discrimination based on characteristics such as race, gender, and age.

2. Civil liberties are negative rights, meaning that they protect individuals from government action that would infringe upon their freedoms. Civil rights, on the other hand, are positive rights that involve the government taking action to ensure equality and prevent discrimination.

3. Civil liberties are often upheld by the judiciary through the interpretation of laws. In contrast, civil rights are frequently the result of legislative action and are enforced by government agencies such as the Department of Justice.

4. Civil liberties are an inherent part of being a citizen, while civil rights are generally conferred by the government.

5. While both civil liberties and civil rights are essential parts of any democratic society, they address different aspects of individual rights and freedoms, with civil liberties focusing on individual autonomy and civil rights addressing the need for equal treatment and access to opportunities.
exclusuionary rule short summary

The exclusionary rule is a legal principle that prevents evidence obtained in violation of the Fourth Amendment from being used in a trial. This means that if the police obtain evidence through an illegal search or seizure, that evidence cannot be presented in court as it was obtained in a way that violated the person's constitutional rights. The exclusionary rule is intended to deter police misconduct and protect citizens' rights to privacy and due process under the law.

conversation.content: 三年级下册语文缩句的方法，请举例说明

三年级下册语文中的缩句方法主要是将一长句话缩为简短的几个单元，让语言更加简洁生动、易于理解。以下是一些例子：

1. 小明爱吃水果。→小明爱吃果。

2. 爷爷每天都散步并认识了很多人。→爷爷每天认识很多人。

3. 妈妈买了新衣服，还买了新鞋子。→妈妈买了衣鞋。

4. 这个周末我们去爬山。我们要早起，准备好牛奶和面包。→周末爬山，起早，备牛奶面包。

5. 昨天下雨，所以我没有去游泳。→昨天雨，没去游泳。

6. 小狗在草地上玩耍，追着蝴蝶跑。→小狗草地上追蝴蝶。

通过缩句的方法，不仅可以有效地减少语言冗余，更可以在一定程度上增加句子的节奏感和美感，使之更加自然流畅。
三年级下册语文缩句的方法和技巧是什么，并请一个举例说明

三年级下册语文缩句的方法和技巧包括：

1. 删除冗余成分：排除一些不必要的修饰语，如形容词、副词等，使语言简明扼要。

例如：小猫的毛长长的，很柔软。 → 小猫毛柔软。

2. 合并句子：将较短的两个简单句合并为一个复合句，更加紧凑有力。

例如：我有一个好朋友。她非常聪明。 → 我有一个非常聪明的好朋友。

3. 转换词性：将形容词、副词等词类转换成名词、动词等更加实际的词汇。

例如：我的妈妈很漂亮。 → 我的妈妈是美女。

4. 变换句式：在语言结构上做文章，如将被动语态改为主动语态，使语言更加生动。

例如：这本书是小明的礼物。 → 小明送给我这本书。

举例说明：

原句：小明坚持每天学习，认真听讲，抄好作业，取得了很大进步。

缩句后：小明坚持认真学习，抄好作业，大有进步。
山长水远见朋友的朋友圈句子

以下是几个关于“山长水远见朋友”的朋友圈句子：

7. 在漫长的人生路途中，有几个懂你的人伴你同行，便是幸福。山高水长，感激有你们的陪伴。
山长水远见朋友的朋友圈句子推荐

以下是一些关于“山长水远见朋友”的朋友圈句子：

锐雯前期对线技巧

锐雯是一个强势的上单刺客英雄，前期对线能力非常强。以下是几个锐雯前期对线的技巧：

1. 把握等级优势。锐雯在前期等级优势下很容易压制对手，因此尽可能在最短时间内升级，达到对手无法抵抗的优势。

2. 利用技能连招。配合能量机关和Q技能，形成连招，可以快速消耗对手的血量，让对方胆寒。

3. 抓住对手疏忽。利用对手疏忽的时机，进行向前强攻，并尽可能保持一定距离，以避免被对手反击。同时最好抓住对方使用技能后的CD时间进攻。

4. 良好的位置意识。在打野的时候，锐雯往往会因为位置不当而被围殴。因此需要时刻保持警惕并注意自身和路势，随时做好规避的准备。

5. 小心防守塔下。尽管锐雯的前期对线能力很强，但还是要注意防守塔下，一不小心就会被塔击中，而失去他们本应得到的经济和经验。

这些是锐雯前期对线的一些技巧，当然还要根据具体情况进行灵活运用。
大雾荒村小说是谁写的
《大雾荒村》是中国当代小说家马伯庸所著，也是他的成名作之一。小说以黑龙江省绥化市城子河区五家村为背景，通过主人公钱立刚等村民的生活遭遇和心路历程，反映了社会和人性的诸多矛盾与问题。该小说获得了第六届茅盾文学奖提名，马伯庸凭借此作品正式进入中国当代文坛。

以下是几个表达4月下雪的心情短语：

Be动词和动词的区别

Be动词和动词是英语中最基本的两种动词，其区别如下：

1. 意义不同：Be动词（am, is, are, was, were, be, been, being）表示“存在”的状态，而动词则表示动作、状态、感觉等。

2. 在句子中的位置不同：Be动词通常用于句子中的谓语部分，如主语+be动词+补语；而动词则可以出现在句子中的各个位置，如主语+动词+宾语。

3. 时态和语态的使用不同：Be动词只能用于被动语态或进行时态，而动词可以出现在各种时态和语态。

例如：

Be动词的使用：I am a teacher.（我是个老师。）

动词的使用：She runs every morning.（她每天早上跑步。）

conversation.content:
帮我润色以下文字：在当今高速发展的互联网时代，各种网站和APP层出不穷，为用户提供了丰富多彩的资源享受，例如音乐、电影、书籍和商品等，使人们的生活变得更加便利。但是，由于用户可以从互联网上获取越来越多的资源，选择这些资源也变得越来越花费时间，而根据用户的喜好和需求推荐适合的资源成为了必要的工作。推荐系统作为解决这一问题的有效工具，近年来得到了广泛关注。其中，作为推荐系统应用领域的重要组成部分，电影推荐系统已经成为电影爱好者首选的电影信息获取方式。它通过收集不同用户的浏览记录、搜索关键字、评价等信息，来分析用户的兴趣爱好，从而为用户推荐个性化的电影资源，提高了电影资源的利用率和用户体验。然而，由于推荐系统存在的一些问题，如推荐结果不准确、推荐速度缓慢、用户体验不佳等，电影推荐服务的发展受到了制约。因此，需要对此进行研究改进。
本研究旨在使用Spark框架，探索内容、协同过滤以及模型三种推荐方法，以实现电影推荐系统的离线和实时推荐，优化推荐准确性和效率，从而提升电影推荐服务的质量。相比于传统的基于用户行为的推荐系统，本研究将考虑更多不同的数据源和算法模型，以更好地理解用户的需求和兴趣。同时，实现离线和实时推荐也将带来更好的推荐速度和用户体验。该研究期望为电影爱好者提供更完善、更准确、更快捷、更个性化的电影推荐服务。在推荐系统的基础上，也将有可能让电影产业更加红火和繁荣。

在当今互联网迅速发展的时代，各类网站和APP如雨后春笋般涌现，为用户带来了丰富多彩的资源体验，如音乐、电影、书籍和商品等，极大地便利了人们的生活。然而，随着用户能在互联网上获取的资源不断增多，选择合适资源的时间成本也在不断上升。因此，根据用户的喜好和需求，推荐适合的资源变得至关重要。作为解决这一问题的有效工具，推荐系统近年来受到了广泛关注。特别是电影推荐系统，作为推荐系统应用领域的重要组成部分，已经成为电影爱好者首选的电影信息获取方式。它通过收集用户的浏览记录、搜索关键字、评价等信息，分析出用户的兴趣爱好，从而为用户推荐个性化的电影资源，提高了电影资源的利用率和用户体验。然而，由于推荐系统存在的一些问题，如推荐结果不准确、推荐速度缓慢、用户体验较差等，电影推荐服务的发展受到了限制。因此，对此类问题进行研究和改进显得尤为重要。

本研究计划利用Spark框架，探讨内容、协同过滤以及模型三种推荐方法，旨在实现电影推荐系统的离线与实时推荐，优化推荐准确性和效率，从而提升电影推荐服务的质量。与传统的基于用户行为的推荐系统相比，本研究将综合考虑更多不同的数据源和算法模型，以更全面地洞察用户的需求和兴趣。同时，实现离线与实时推荐也将为用户带来更快速的推荐体验。此研究期望为电影爱好者提供更完善、更准确、更快捷、更个性化的电影推荐服务。在推荐系统的基础上，有望进一步助力电影产业的繁荣和发展。

conversation.content:
Use Chinglish to re-describe the following content without repeated descriptions and adjust the word order  and make the language fluent 

The sector is highly fragmented and its track record in commercialising seed innovations is weak, according to experts.
China has established a system that grants intellectual property rights to new varieties called New Plant Variety (NPV) rights.
In 2021, the government took a major step by improving protection of NPV rights for breeders through an amended seed law that introduced the concept of Essentially Derived Varieties (EDV), which are deemed lacking innovation.

Experts say the sector be much scattered and weak in commercialising seed innovations. China has built a system that gives intellectual property rights (IPR) to new varieties, this called New Plant Variety (NPV) rights. In 2021, government take big step, improve NPV rights protection for breeders by amending seed law, and introduce the Essentially Derived Varieties (EDV) concept, which be seen as not having innovation.

conversation.content:
请帮忙标记出以下文字中的错别字、病句、语句不通顺的地方。
很高兴能推荐张智杰参加中科院优秀博士毕业论文的评选。张智杰在数据驱动的影响力最大化问题上取得了多个很好的研究成果。在样本优化模型中，他创新性的提出了结构化样本优化的模型并对最大覆盖问题和影响力最大化问题都给出了常数近似比的近似算法，这个结果克服了标准样本模型下不存在常数近似算法的理论困难，为样本优化问题在实际应用中的使用提供了很好的理论基础。而在老虎机模型中，他的结果弱化了前人工作中的边反馈信息的要求，使得模型更加贴合实际应用数据并取得了和之前一样的优化效果。
	理论计算机领域是一个很容易有科研挫败感的方向，在张智杰这些年的读博生涯中，也经历过不少挫折，比如读博早期在次模优化方向的研究课题中，前后历时两年半，经历了五六次拒稿，以及多次长达数个月的没有任何新的思路和进展的过程。但难能可贵的是他依然对科研有非常高的热情，两年多的时间内始终投入了大量时间想题，不断尝试各种新的算法技巧，最终彻底解决了这个问题。很高兴他在科研的早期并没有因为长期做不来问题或者做出来的结果得不到认可而动摇继续理论研究的勇气，顺利度过这个早期阶段，无论是理论分析还是论文撰写的能力都有了明显的提高，并在博士后期的科研工作上突飞猛进。从开始接触数据驱动模型下的次模优化问题这个方向后，在短短一年半之内就在样本模型和老虎机模型下的次模优化问题方向完成并发表了3篇CCF A类会议论文，且都是一次投稿就被接受。最终由这些研究成果形成了他的博士论文。论文无论在理论方面的创新性贡献、应用场景的适用性、语言文字流畅等方面都能展示出他在读博阶段巨大的提升。

1. 错别字：无
2. 病句/语句不通顺：
- 在样本优化模型中，他创新性的提出了结构化样本优化的模型并对最大覆盖问题和影响力最大化问题都给出了常数近似比的近似算法，这个结果克服了标准样本模型下不存在常数近似算法的理论困难，为样本优化问题在实际应用中的使用提供了很好的理论基础。 --> 这句话较长，可以拆成两句更加清晰
- 而在老虎机模型中，他的结果弱化了前人工作中的边反馈信息的要求，使得模型更加贴合实际应用数据并取得了和之前一样的优化效果。 --> 这句话可以加上对之前一样的优化效果的具体描述，让意思更加明确。

conversation.content: 资本下乡跑马圈地案例

资本下乡跑马圈地是指大型企业在农村地区进行大规模投资和开发，试图占领农村资源和市场的现象。这种行为往往伴随着对当地农民权利的剥夺和环境的破坏。

近年来，中国出现了不少资本下乡跑马圈地的案例，例如：

1. 云南白药在云南红河县建设中国最大的中药材种植基地，引起当地农民的抗议和反对。

2. 顺丰集团在湖南郴州投资建设物流园，引起周边村民反对，称破坏了农田和生态环境。

3. 招商局集团在重庆万州区投资建设的生态宜居小镇，引起了当地农民的不满和抗议，称其迫使当地农民让出土地，环境污染严重。

资本下乡跑马圈地不仅扰乱了农村社会的秩序，也对当地生态环境和农民利益产生了负面影响。因此，应该加强对这种不合理行为的监管和调控，避免对农村地区资源和环境的过度开发和消耗。

请围绕”警惕资本下乡出现“跑马圈地”等不良倾向”写一篇信息。有数据、有实例；坚持问题导向，重点写存在问题；对策建议针对性强、切实可行。2000字以内

近年来，资本下乡的现象越来越引起人们的关注。随着城市化进程的不断加速和信息技术的快速发展，越来越多的大型企业开始将目光转向农村地区。然而，过度的资本下乡对农村社会经济和生态环境带来了严重的负面影响，这些问题亟待解决。本文将从不同方面探讨资本下乡跑马圈地等不良倾向的存在问题及解决策略。

一、存在问题

1. 农村土地被大规模占有

资本下乡的企业往往会以各种名义投资和开发农村地区，以获取利润。然而，许多企业的投资并不真正服务于当地农民，或者只是将农村土地作为投机的对象。因此，大规模占有农村土地已经成为了一种常见的现象。由于企业通常会使用大量的土地、水源和其他自然资源，当地农民很可能会失去他们唯一的生计来源。此外，由于土地占用问题，农田荒芜、村庄荒废、农民生活受到了严重的影响。

2. 农民权益受到侵害

资本下乡跑马圈地的过程中，往往常常涉及到农民土地流转的问题。一些企业会利用各种手段占有农民的产权，并且将土地用于自己的生产和经营。这种行为不仅让农民面对土地流转导致的生计风险，也存在不少问题，例如极低的流转价格、无保障的租期和缺少后续的保障政策等。因此，农民的权益受到侵害，这是需要高度关注的一个问题。

3. 生态环境得不到保护

资本下乡的企业往往会在农村地区建设生产基地或者是经济区域，大规模地开发当地的自然资源。在这个过程中，许多企业都没有很好地保护环境，导致了水资源的污染和土地的破坏。例如，水污染和土地荒漠化是很多农村地区的普遍现象，而企业的规模化运作已经成为了这种问题的根源。因此，保护生态环境已经成为了资本下乡需要解决的一个重要问题。

二、针对性策略

1. 完善土地流转政策

对于资本下乡跑马圈地的问题，需要我们完善相应的土地流转政策，保障农民的权益。在土地开发过程中，应保证农民的产权不受侵害。如果企业需要通过流转土地来实现生产，应该制定相关的规定，确保土地流转的价格合理、租期有保障、保障农民的利益。此外，要建立合适的土地征收、流转和补偿机制，以保护农民的利益。

2. 加强环保力度

资本下乡过程中的环境保护问题亟待解决。因此，应该在生产过程中重视环境及资源保护。企业应在环境保护法规和标准范畴内生产，尤其需要在废水、废气、废渣和废土的处理和处置方面更加重视。政府也应当对企业进行更加严格的监管，确保企业在环境方面负责任。

3. 加强监管力度

为了避免资本下乡活动的不当行为，需要加强监管力度。应该在地方人民政府和监管机构中建立完善的监管制度，遏制资本下乡中的不当行为。实际上，必要的督查和检查机制需要更好地发挥力量，遏制企业的不良行为，消除投资过程中的潜在风险。同时，要全面规范资本下乡，妥善处置重大投资项目风险，保证企业依法依规开展投资活动。

三、结论

通过对资本下乡跑马圈地不良倾向存在问题的分析和对策的提出，我们可以发现，目前资本下乡跑马圈地的现象对农村社会经济和生态环境产生了严重的负面影响。因此，需要高度关注和重视这个问题，加强监管力度和规范投资行为，以更好地保护农民权益和生态环境。保护农村地区的民生需要，真正走的是“功在当代，利在百世”的道路。
农村土地被大规模占有，举一些案例

下面是一些资本下乡跑马圈地中农村土地被大规模占有的案例：

1. 云南白药种植基地

云南白药集团在云南红河县投资建设了中国最大的中药材种植基地。该基地占地将近4万亩，对当地农民的农田和生态环境造成了重大影响。农民抗议称，基地的建设导致土地数量严重不足，严重威胁到他们的生计。

2. 万州生态宜居小镇

重庆万州区“生态宜居小镇”项目，由招商局发展集团投资15亿元，规划总面积1.2万亩。然而，据当地农民披露，企业将近3000亩农地转让给了项目公司，他们被如此大规模占用农田而“遭殃”，生活质量明显下降，而企业方面并未给当地农民任何的补偿或者是赔偿。

3. 德威新材料农业社会化服务站

浙江省桐乡市德威新材料科技股份有限公司建立农业社会化服务站，将近1700亩农地被占用。当地村民称，企业以流转承包土地的名义在他们村里占下近千亩，农民面对贷款、租地、拆迁等一系列权益被侵犯。

这些案例都反映了资本下乡跑马圈地的问题，它们只是当前状况中的一部分。总之，应该重视以上问题，加强对法规的监管，避免对农村地区资源和环境的过度开发和消耗。
云南白药种植基地这个案例再详细补充

云南白药集团在云南红河县投资建设的中国最大中药材种植基地，总投资达50亿元。该项目占地近4万亩，设计年产值近500亿元。然而，基地的建设却引起了当地农民的抗议和反对。

在基地建设过程中，企业占用大量土地资源，导致农民耕地面积减少，生计受到严重影响。此外，在基地的建设过程中，企业也没有注重环境保护，导致了当地土壤污染等问题。

对于这个问题，农民围绕种田权、土地流转、环境污染等方面开展了大规模的示威和抗议活动，这些活动逐渐获得公众的支持。在媒体曝光的压力下，云南白药集团也不断调整项目计划，减少对农田的使用，缩小项目规模，以试图减轻当地农民的不满。

这个案例反映了资本下乡跑马圈地问题中的常见现象，即企业过度占用土地资源，导致当地农民的生计受到严重影响。因此，管理者需要加强对资本下乡的监管力度，完善相关的法律法规，保护农民的权利，并维护当地生态环境的可持续发展。只有当资本下乡的活动合理规范时，企业才能够更好地发挥其经济功能，为农村的发展和中国经济的发展做出贡献。
有没有广东的案例

有，以下是广东资本下乡跑马圈地的一个案例：

广东中山市举办了大规模的“乡村振兴创新创业活动”，以吸引更多的资本和企业前来投资发展农村经济。然而，在一些企业参与活动的过程中，存在着大规模占有农村土地的问题，引起了当地农民的抗议和反对。

在接受媒体采访时，当地农民代表表示，一些企业在建设农村经济新品牌和商业景点的过程中，占用了大量农村土地资源，导致当地农民种田面积减少，严重削弱了他们的生产和生活能力。此外，这些企业在投资过程中也没有很好地保护生态环境，导致水源污染和土地破坏等问题。

对于这个案例，一些专家呼吁政府加强对资本下乡的监管力度，制定相关法律方案，防止企业越过规定的法律和道德要求，占用大量的农村土地资源，并破坏当地生态环境。这也提示我们，对于资本下乡跑马圈地等问题，我们需要加强对土地、环保、资源保障等方面的重视，以更好地保护农民权益和生态环境。
时间、地点、资料来源

conversation.content: 请润色以下清明祭祖文：时维四月，岁在庚子，节届清明。湖水碧而波涟漪，青山翠而万物发。肺疫当前，网络追思，资兴樊氏后裔昭告于上党樊氏堂上列祖列宗曰：朗朗乾坤，华夏后裔。樊氏一脉，绵绵千年。山甫受姓泽被汪洋，上党始郡耀旺古今。大雅补袞，今尤传唱。四海迁播，子孙亿万。大德星宿思斋祖，根出豫章峩岭，开资兴樊氏七百载之鼻。风水宝地大管塘，地邻城东近郊，发六村上万子孙之始。玺公掌桂林永福县官印，积累代之禄爵，兼有始制家族之谱，功业照千秋。善祖荣膺王官，展血脉治可高寿。数世奋斗耕耘，人丁造作满资兴，福千秋万代。庭训十二录，字字珠玑，规子孙之嘉行。祖训共八则，言辞深切，定安身立命之要旨。为学需勤，为事需诚，为官需廉，为商需善。坦坦荡荡做人，大大方方做事。累积超世之德才，竖立坚韧不拔之志。穷则努力改变，达则兼济天下。祖宗智慧，无穷无尽。幸赖吾祖，德行笃厚。惠及子孙，房房发达；荫佑四方，代代荣昌。网络缅怀先人之恩德功业，此恩此德，比天高，比海深。万水千山总关情，天涯海角不忘根。清明祭扫当推崇，资兴樊氏薪火传。欣逢盛世谋发达，代有英才作栋梁。各行各业展雄风，人业兴旺铸辉煌。网络致祭，祷告英灵。祖宗有灵，永佑后人。叩首拜谒，致真致诚，感达上苍。伏惟尚飨！2020.4.3资兴樊氏后裔

时逢四月庚子，清明节至。湖水碧波荡漾，青山翠色迷人。然而，此时此刻，我们的国土正面临着新冠肺炎的疫情蔓延，无数生命在此时被夺去。在这样的环境下，我们网络追思着过去的祖先，并向上党樊氏堂上列祖列宗郑重宣告：华夏后裔辈出，樊氏一脉传承千年。山甫接受了为姓的泽水之福，上党始郡耀世今古。大雅补袞之隆，至今仍被传唱。樊氏人才四海迁移，亿万子孙延续宗族之脉。大德星宿思斋祖就诞生在豫章峩岭，开创了资兴樊氏七百年族谱的历史。而风水宝地大管塘，则成为地道的资兴樊氏之始，它靠近城东近郊，是六村上万子孙之祖。祖先们受封官衔，展下血脉治理可高寿的统治智慧。祖训十二录，文句珠玑，规范了子孙要秉持的美德。祖先的教诲总共有八则，内容深入人心，强调安身立命的实质。学习需要勤奋，事情需要真诚，官员需要廉洁，商人需要善良，做人坦坦荡荡，做事大大方方，通过累积超越世代的社会贡献，竖立坚不摇的志向。当面对逆境时，我们需要努力改善，而在达到成功时，我们需要回报天下人。祖先和睿智无穷无尽，因着先辈们所传承，资兴樊氏的德行笃厚。而家族的荣耀延续至子孙后代，开创未来的新局面。

今天，在网络崇拜的仪式中，我们寄托着先人之恩德、功业之美，虽然此恩此德高于天、深于海，但是我们却记得万水千山总关情，自此天涯海角却不忘本根。清明祭扫要推崇，资兴樊氏的薪火传世。我们有幸生活在一个充满机遇的时代，我们代表樊氏后裔，希望我们可以成为这个世界的领导者。在各行各业中迎来昂扬的风，引领人业兴旺，展现辉煌云端。在这里，我们向英灵祈祷，感谢祖先给我们留下的宝贵遗产。我们向上天叩头，用真心实意的态度表示感激之情。我们深知是由上苍赐予了我们这样的家族背景，因此，我们抱着虔诚心灵向神祈祷，祖宗有灵，永保后人，我们一定时刻牢记祖先与上苍的关爱恩惠。

conversation.content: 帮我翻译一下《Whose Advice is Credible? Claiming Lay Expertise in a Covid‑19 Online Community》这篇文章

《谁的建议可信？在Covid-19在线社区中宣称外行专家地位》

在这篇文章中，作者探讨了在Covid-19大流行期间，人们如何在在线社区分享信息和建议。这里的关键问题是，在缺乏正式专业知识的情况下，哪些参与者的观点被认为是可信的，并且他们是如何通过宣称外行专家地位来建立这种信任关系的。

作者使用Reddit社交媒体平台上关于Covid-19的主题作为研究案例，系统地分析了在线讨论和建议的内容。研究发现，大多数参与者都在努力为他们的观点寻找证据，以便提高自己的信誉。而这些证据通常来自于个人经验、从其他论坛收集的信息以及对权威来源（如新闻报道和政府公告）的引用。然后，这些证据被用来表明这些参与者具有足够的外行专家足以提供有关Covid-19的有效建议。

此外，研究发现，在线参与者之间的关系和互动也是信任和可信度的重要来源。那些积极参与在线讨论的人，尤其是那些为他人提供帮助和支持的人，往往会在社区中建立更高的声誉。因此，声望成为了一种社会资本，有助于人们在没有正式专业知识的情况下获得信任。

文章强调，在这个信息量爆炸的时代，了解在线社区中可信度的构建机制是至关重要的。这对于我们如何在日常生活中评估各种信息来源并采纳建议具有很高的实际意义。虽然正式的专业知识在某种程度上仍然受到尊重，但外行专家的影响力已经明显增长。因此，我们需要更加关注这种新兴现象，并分辨出那些假装是专家的人。

This is mainly because the farther apart the snapshot objects are in time, the less related they are in terms of attribute changes and spatial distribution. Therefore, this paper only compares the newly added snapshot objects with the adjacent snapshot objects in the spatiotemporal cluster.

When judging the spatial overlap, it is necessary to calculate the intersected area of ci and ci+1. As long as the proportion of the intersection area in either ci or ci+1 is not less than θ, and the difference in attribute values does not exceed the AttEps parameter, the two snapshot objects can be divided into the same spatiotemporal cluster. The steps for spatiotemporal clustering are as follows:

(1) Traverse the raster images at each moment and extract snapshot objects of each state;
(2) Traverse all snapshot objects at the current moment and retrieve the collection of overlapping and similar snapshot objects at the previous moment for each snapshot object;
(3) If all snapshots in the collection belong to the same spatiotemporal cluster, add the snapshot of the current moment to this spatiotemporal cluster; if the snapshots in the collection do not belong to the same spatiotemporal cluster, merge these spatiotemporal clusters and add the current moment's snapshot.

Step (3) deals with the development, merger, and splitting events in the spatiotemporal cluster. Development refers to adding unclassified snapshot objects to a spatiotemporal cluster; merging refers to the relationships where two snapshot objects at the same moment overlap and have a similar attribute relationship with the same snapshot object in the next moment; splitting is the opposite of merging, where two snapshot objects at the same moment overlap and have a similar attribute relationship with the same snapshot object in the previous moment.

Contrary to snapshot object extraction, spatiotemporal clustering does not account for the overall features of spatiotemporal clusters and the newly added snapshot objects. The primary reason for this is that snapshot objects with larger intervals between moments exhibit weaker correlations concerning attribute changes and spatial distribution. Consequently, this study compares newly added snapshot objects only with adjacent snapshot objects within the spatiotemporal cluster.

To determine spatial overlap, the intersection area between ci and ci+1 must be calculated. If the proportion of the intersection area in ci or ci+1 is no less than θ and the difference in attribute values does not exceed the AttEps parameter, the two snapshot objects can be assigned to the same spatiotemporal cluster. The steps for spatiotemporal clustering are as follows:

1) Iterate through each moment's raster images, extracting snapshot objects for each state;
2) Traverse all snapshot objects at the current moment and search for overlapping and similar snapshot object collections from the previous moment for each snapshot object;
3) If every snapshot in the collection belongs to a single spatiotemporal cluster, add the current moment's snapshot to the corresponding cluster; if the collection's snapshots do not all belong to the same spatiotemporal cluster, merge these clusters and include the current moment's snapshot.

Step 3 handles the evolution, merging, and splitting events of the spatiotemporal clusters. Evolution refers to appending unclassified snapshot objects to a specific spatiotemporal cluster; merging occurs when two snapshot objects at the same moment overlap and share similar attributes with one snapshot object in the next moment; splitting, contrary to merging, happens when two snapshot objects at the same moment overlap and share similar attributes with a single snapshot object in the previous moment.

在这里，"zu"是一个介词，表示"对于"、"关于"。"Die Bereitschaft zu reflektieren" 是一个德语短语，可以翻译成 "关于反思的意愿"。其中，"Bereitschaft" 是"意愿"、"态度"的意思，"reflektieren" 指"对自己的行为、想法进行反思和批判"。

conversation.content: vlc播放ps视频流长时间时钟同步问题导致ps_deplay的解决办法

1. 确认ps视频流的时间戳是否正确，可以通过wireshark等网络抓包工具观察。

2. 在vlc的选项设置中，将“时钟同步”选项设置为“主时钟是否使用PTS参考”。

3. 如果仍然出现ps_deplay的问题，可以尝试修改输入音视频流的帧率参数，使其与ps视频流的帧率保持一致。

4. 在vlc的高级选项中，设置“设置速度模式”为“视频质量和适时缓冲”，以确保播放的流畅和同步。

5. 如果以上方法均无效，尝试使用其他媒体播放器，比如MPC-HC、PotPlayer等。

Fujian is a beautiful ecological and economically developed province uniquely named after the Chinese character "福" (fortune). Over the past 40 years of reform and opening up, Fujian's Gross Domestic Product (GDP) has grown from 6.637 billion yuan in 1978 to 3.58 trillion yuan in 2018, with an average annual growth rate of 12.2%. We adhere to the belief that "green water and lush mountains are invaluable assets", and have become the first national pilot zone for ecological civilization. Fujian's ecological index consistently ranks first in China. "Ecological Fujian" is renowned throughout the country.

conversation.content: Arapçada belağat nedir, önemi nedir?

Arapçada belağat,  dil ve edebiyat alanında kullanılan bir kavramdır ve bir konuyu ya da düşünceyi oldukça etkili bir şekilde ifade etme sanatıdır. Önemi çok büyüktür çünkü bir konuda etkili bir şekilde ifade etmek, karşısındakilerin anlamasını ve kabul etmesini kolaylaştırır. Belağat sayesinde, açık, güçlü, anlamlı ve ikna edici ifade edebilirsiniz. Arapçada belağat, Kur'an gibi kutsal yazıların anlaşılabilirliğini arttırır ve bilim, felsefe, politika, ticaret ve diğer alanlarda insanların karşılıklı anlayışını ve iletişimini arttırır.
En az 2 sayfa olsun

Tamam, biraz daha detaylandırmaya çalışacağım.

Arapça dilinde, belağat ifade becerisi anlamına gelir. İyi bir belagat sahibi, bir konuyu veya düşünceyi doğru ve güzel bir şekilde ifade edebilir. Belağatın amacı, dinleyicinin, okuyucunun veya izleyicinin dikkatini çekmek ve konunun anlaşılmasını kolaylaştırmaktır.

Belağatın önemi, iletişimdeki başarının anahtarıdır. İyi bir belağat sahibi, karşısındakini etkileyebilir ve ikna edebilir. Bu nedenle, belağat sadece din, edebiyat veya şiir gibi konularda değil, diğer alanlarda da büyük öneme sahiptir. Özellikle iş dünyasında, belağat becerileri başarı için çok önemlidir. Satış, pazarlama, liderlik, sunum yapma ve müzakere gibi alanlarda, etkili bir şekilde iletişim kurabilen kişiler daha başarılı olurlar.

Arap edebiyatı, belağatın en önemli örneklerinin yer aldığı zengin bir kültürel hazinedir. Şiirler, hikayeler, veciz sözler ve atasözleri, belağatın farklı türlerini yansıtır. Örneğin, hikayelerde ve kısa anlatılarda, okuyucuyu etkilemek için güçlü bir giriş, heyecan verici bir orta bölüm ve etkileyici bir son kullanılır. Şiirlerdeyse, uyak, ritim ve benzetmeler kullanılarak anlatılmak istenen duygu veya düşünce daha etkili bir şekilde ifade edilir.

Belağatın önemli bir diğer yönü, Kur'an-ı Kerim'in anlaşılabilirliğini artırmasıdır. Kur'an, Arapça dilinin en önemli örneklerinden biridir ve tüm İslam dünyası için kutsal bir kitaptır. İyi bir belağat sahibi olan bir kişi, Kur'an'ın mesajını daha iyi anlayabilir ve bu mesajı başkalarına daha iyi aktarabilir.

Sonuç olarak, Arapçada belağatın önemi oldukça büyüktür. Dil ve edebiyat alanında kullanılan bir kavram olan belağat, iletişimdeki başarının anahtarıdır. İyi bir belağat sahibi, karşısındakileri etkileyebilir, düşüncelerini daha etkili bir şekilde ifade edebilir ve anlaşılabilirliği artırır. Arap edebiyatı, belağatın farklı türlerinin en güzel örneklerinin yer aldığı zengin bir kültürel hazinedir ve Kur'an'ın anlaşılabilirliğini artırır. Bu nedenle, belağatın önemi sadece Arap dünyasında değil, tüm dünyada büyüktür.

proofread الوضعية
ترسيخا لقيم الإسلام السمحة و تزامنا مع بداية شهر رمضان المبارك .  شاهدت برنامجا دينيا في احدى القنوات التلفزية . تحدث فيه مقدم البرنامج . بعد تلاوته لايات بينات من سورة القلم .. عن الصوم و احكامه المختلفة . و أهمية الاحسان الى الناس . كما حث المشاهدين و المشاهدات على ا لاقتداء برسولنا الكريم صلى الله عليه وسلم.

Proofread: 

ترسيخاً لقيم الإسلام السمحة وتزامناً مع بداية شهر رمضان المبارك، شاهدت برنامجًا دينيًا في إحدى القنوات التلفزية. تحدث فيه مقدم البرنامج بعد تلاوته لآيات بينات من سورة القلم عن الصوم وأحكامه المختلفة، وأهمية الإحسان إلى الناس، كما حث المشاهدين والمشاهدات على الاقتداء برسولنا الكريم صلى الله عليه وسلم.

Proofread:

1. استظهرك. (2 ن) 

إن الذين يخشون ربهم بالغيب لهم مغفرة وأجر كبير. فإذا هي تمور.

2. اشرحي معنى نفور (0.5 ن)

النفور: الابتعاد والاستنكار والتنفير.

3. حددي له الحكم التجويدي لكلمة "وهم نائمون" في قوله تعالى: {فطاف عليهم طائف من ربك وهم نائمون} (0.5 ن) 

المد المتصل.

4. أذكري فضل الإيمان بالقضاء والقدر مما يلي: (1 ن)

الرضا والتسليم والاطمئنان والسكينة.

5. اعرف الإحسان. كما ورد في حديث جبريل عليه السلام (1 ن)

إحسانُ الْعَمَلِ.

6. عرِّفي معنى الإيمان (1 ن)

الإيمان هو الإقرار بالجنان والنار وأركانه الستة: الإقرار باللسان والإيمان بالقلب والعمل بالجوارح والإدراك بالذهن واليقين بالكل.

7. املأي الجدول (2 ن)

شروط الصيام                     فرائض الصيام                     فوائد الصيام 
النية                                   الامتناع عن المفطرات              تقوية الإرادة 
عدم الجوع والعطش                  قضاء الأيام الفائتة                  القضاء على العادات السيئة 
التحلي بالأخلاق الحسنة          تفريغ الأمعاء والتخلص من السموم    الصحة الجسدية 

8. ربطي بين اسم الملك وما كلف به. (1 ن)

جبريل - تبليغ الوحي
ملك الموت - قبض الأرواح
ميكائيل - الأمطار
إسرافيل - النفخ في الصور

9. اختصري قصة مريم ابنة عمران بأسلوبك الخاص.
اختصر قصة مريم ابنة عمران بأسلوبك الخاص.

قصة مريم عليها السلام هي قصة امرأة بارة تقدَّم الله لها بنعمة الإنجاب ووهبَها بنتًا تنفرد بالكمال والتقوى. وعلى الرغم من تعرضها لاضطهاد واتهامات الناس، إلا أنها بقوة الإيمان والتصديق بقدرة الله دفعت هذه الاتهامات وانطلقت في رحلةٍ من التأمـّل والتضرع إلى الله. وفي النهاية، رزقها الله بمعجزةٍ كبرى، فإنجبت ابنًا نقيًا طاهرًا، هو عيسى عليه السلام.
6. عرِّفي اركان الإيمان (1 ن)

أركان الإيمان هي:

1- الإيمان بالله، الذي يشمل تصديق وجود الله، ووصفه بالصفات الكاملة الذي لا يُشبه شيء ولا يُحدَّد بمكان، ولا يتأثر بالزمان.

2- الإيمان بالملائكة، الذي يشمل تصديق وجود الملائكة والإيمان بوظائفهم ومهامهم التي أوكلها الله إليهم.

3- الإيمان بالكتب السماوية، الذي يشمل تصديق نزول الكتب السماوية على المرسلين، والإيمان بتعاليمها وأوامرها ونواهيها.

4- الإيمان بالأنبياء، الذي يشمل تصديق وجود الأنبياء والإيمان برسالتهم وإتمامها، والإيمان بأنهم معصومون من الخطأ والخطيئة في الرسالة التي بشروا بها.

5- الإيمان باليوم الآخر، الذي يشمل تصديق وجود الحساب والجزاء بعد الموت، ويرتبط بالإيمان بالبعث والنشور.

6- الإيمان بالقدر، الذي يشمل تصديق الإرادة الكاملة لله عز وجل في خلق الأشياء وتقديرها، والجزاء والعقاب على حسب كنز الإنسان من الأعمال الصالحة والسيئة.

.............................................................................................................................

1) اذكري مثالًا على الإحسان الى الآخرين وشرحيه. (2 ن)

2) اكتبي اية قرآنية تحث على الأخلاق الحسنة وشرحيها. (2 ن)

3) اذكري ثلاثة من أسماء الصحابة الذين قادوا المسلمين بعد وفاة الرسول صلى الله عليه وسلم وشرحي دورهم. (3 ن)

4) تحدثي عن فضل العلم والتعلم في الإسلام. (3 ن)

5) اشرحي ما هي الصلاة ومكوناتها. (3 ن)

6) اربطي بين المصطلح الشرعي والتعريف (2 ن)

الصلاة - عبادة الله عز وجل المشروعة على الخلائق المؤمنين وهي تتكون من الركوع والسجود والقيام والقراءة.

الزكاة - الركن الثالث في الإسلام والمال الذي يعطى للفقراء والمحتاجين ويتمثل في الإنفاق على المال المذموم والمال الزكوي.

الصدقة - العطية التي تعطى لمن يستحقها وقد يكون من المحتاجين والمساكين وهي أفضل الأعمال الخيرية وتدل على التراحم والتعاون بين الناس.

7) اذكري أركان الإسلام وشرحي لكل منها. (3 ن)

8) اشرحي مفهوم الوحي في الإسلام. (2 ن)

9) اذكري فوائد الصيام وشرحي لكل منها. (3 ن)

Aşağıdaki âyetlerde yer alan emir kiplerinden hangisi delalet ettiği hükmün bağlayıcılığı açısından diğerlerinden farklıdır?

a.كلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هنيا 

b فَاقِيمُوا الصَّلوةَ وَاتُوا الزَّكوة 

فَانكِحُوا مَا طَابَ لَكُم مِنَ النساء مثنc٠ xi G jg =L g

واذا حللتم فاصطادوا ..

فَإِذَا قُضيب الصلوة فانتشروا في ... الأرض

Dördüncü şık "فَاصْطَادُوا" emri kipi olarak diğerlerinden farklıdır. Bu fiil avlanmak anlamına gelirken, diğer üç emir kipi (yüklem) yemek yeme, namaz kılma ve zekat verme gibi dinî ibadetlerle alakalıdır. Bu nedenle dördüncü emir kipi, diğerlerinden farklı bir kategoride olduğu için bağlayıcılığı açısından öne çıkmaktadır.

والمُطلَّقَاتُ يَتَرَبَّصْنَ بِأَنفُسِهِنَّ ثَلُثَةَ قُرُوةِ âyetiyle ilgili aşağıdakilerden hangisi söylenemez?

 a. Hanefiler'e göre, iddetin tam üç kur' olabilmesi, ona ancak tuhr manası vermekle mümkündür.

b. Hanefiler "kur" kelimesine hayız, Şafiiler ise tuhr anlamı vermişlerdir.

c. Ayette, birden fazla anlama delalet eden müşterek bir lafız bulunmaktadır.

d. Âyet, boşanmış kadınların iddet süresiyle ilgili bir hüküm ihtiva etmektedir.

e. Hanefiler kendi görüşünü, has lafzın manaya delaletinin kat'ı olduğunu ileri sürerek temellendirmeye çalışmışlardır.
E seçeneği yanlıştır. Âyet, boşanmış kadınların iddet süresiyle ilgili bir hüküm içerir, bu doğrudur.

Emir ve nehiy ile ilgili aşağıdaki ifadelerden hangisi yanlıştır?

اعْمَلُوا ما شتم انه بما تعملون بصير . ayetindeki emir kipi, emir anlamını içermez.

وان كنتم في ريب مما نزلنا على عبدنا b. ayetinde فأتوا بسورة من منك emredilen şeyi yerine getirmek haramdır.

فانكحوا ما طاب لكم من النساء مثنى . ibahaya , ayetindekiemir EV ig -V 2 delalet eder.

ayetindeki nehiy kipi ولا تقربوا الزنى od tekrar, fevr ve terahi ifade eder.

ربنا ولا تحفلنا ما لا طاقة لنا به De ayetindeki nehly kipi, dua anlamındadır.

B seçeneği yanlıştır. Ayette "فَأْتُوا بِسُورَةٍ مِّن مِّثْلِهِ" şeklinde bir emir kipi kullanılmıştır ve bu emir kipi, verilen işin yapılması gerektiğini ifade etmektedir. Bu nedenle bu işi yapmamak haram değil, yapılmaması durumunda sadece cevap verme sorumluluğu doğar.

Aşağıdaki cümlelerden hangisi yanlıştır?

a. Kuran-ı Kerim'in sübut değeri konusunda âlimler arasında görüş ayrılığı bulunmamaktadır.

b. Bir ayet veya hadisin sübutu, kaynağa aidiyetiyle; delaleti ise işaret ettiği anlamla ilgilidir.

c. Sünnetin bir kısmı hem sübut, hem de delalet bakımından kat'idir.

e. Sünnetin bir kısmı delalet bakımından zannidir.

d. Kur'an-ı Kerim'in bütünü delalet bakımından katidir.
A seçeneği yanlıştır. Kuran-ı Kerim'in sübut değeri konusunda âlimler arasında görüş ayrılıkları bulunmaktadır.

والسارق والسَّارِقَةُ فَاقْطَعُوا أَيْدِيَهُمَا يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِذَا قُمْتُمْ إِلَى الصَّلاةِ فَاغْسِلُوا وجوهكم وأيديكم إلى المرافق

Yukarıdaki âyetlerle ilgili aşağıdaki Ifadelerden hangisi ya da hangileri doğrudur?

Lütfen bir ya da daha fazlasını seçin:

Her iki ayette de el kelimesi mukayyed olarak kullanılmıştır.

Ayetlerden çıkarılan hükümler ve bu hükümlerin sebepleri farklıdır

Her iki âyette de el kelimesi "bileğe kadar olarak anlaşılmalıdır, abdestte ellerin dirseğe kadar yıkanmasının zorunlu oluşu başka ayetlerden anlaşılır.

Ayetlerden çıkarılan hükümler farklı olsa da bu hükümlerin sebebi aynıdır.

Bu ayetlerde mutlakin mukayyede hamledilmeyeceği konusunda mezhepler ittifak etmiştir.

C seçeneği doğrudur. Her iki âyette de el kelimesi mukayyed olarak kullanılmıştır ve bu kelimenin "bileğe kadar" olarak anlaşılması gerekir. Abdestte ellerin dirseğe kadar yıkanması zorunluluğu ise başka âyetlerden anlaşılmaktadır. Ancak, ayetlerden çıkarılan hükümler farklıdır. Birinci ayet, hırsızlık yapanların cezası olarak el kesmeyi emrederken ikinci ayet, namaz öncesi abdest alınması gerektiğini belirtmektedir.

Hükümle ilgili aşağıdaki anlatımlardan hangisi yanlıştır?

a. Fikih usulünde ehliyet ve ehliyet arızlanı mahkum fih (hükme konu olan fiil) başlığı altında incelenir.

b. Hanefi ve Cumhur âlimlerinin hüküm terimine yüklediği farklı anlam, aynı kategorideki bazı teklifi hükümlerin farklı isimlendirilmesine neden olmuştur.

c. Mähküm fihin kişinin güç yetirebileceği nitelikte olması gerekir.

d. Hükme konu olan fiillerde aranacak şartlardan birisi olan "marifet" ile, fiilin bilinebilir olması kastedilir.

e. Hükme konu olan fiil ve hükme muhatap olan mükellef, usûl-i fikhin hüküm bahisleri bölümünde ele alınır.
C seçeneği yanlıştır. Mahkum fihin kişinin güç yetirebileceği nitelikte olması gerekmez. Hüküme konu olan fiilin hüküm ifade etmesi gerekmektedir.

"Ebu Hanife'ye göre delaleti........... olan bir ayetle........... hükmü sabit olamaz" cümlesinde boş bırakılan yerlere hangi kelimelerin getirilmesi gerekir?

a. zanni-haram.

b. zanni-vacib.

c. kati-haram

d. zanni - mendub.

e. kati- farz

A seçeneği "zanni-haram" doğru cevaptır. Ebu Hanife'ye göre, bir hüküm zannî meşru bir hükmü destekleyen bir delille sabit olabilir, ancak zannî bir delilin haram hüküm oluşturmak için yeterli olmadığına inanıyordu. Bu nedenle, "delaleti zannî olan bir ayetle haram hükmü sabit olamaz" diyebiliriz.

Hüsun ve kubuh ile ilgili aşağıdaki

anlatımlardan hangisi yanlıştır?

a. Maturidiler'e göre Şâri'in mesajının ulaşmadığı insan, aklıyla bu kâinatin bir yaratıcısı olduğunu bilemez.

b. Mutezile'ye göre Şâri'in mesajı ulaşmasa bile insan aklı iyi ve kötü şeyleri ayırt edip, iyi şeyleri yerine getirmek ve kötülüklerden kaçınmak zorundadır.

c. Hüsun ve kubuh konusunda Mâtüridî âlimleri, Mütezile ve Eşâriler'e göre orta yol takip etmişlerdir.

d. Mâtüridiler'e göre Şâri'in mesaji ulaşmasa bile insan aklı iyi ve kötü şeyleri ayırt edebilir, ancak insan davranışlarıyla ilgili şeri hükmü çoğu zaman Şari in mesajından öğrenebiliriz.

e. Eşariler'e göre insan aklı iyi ve kötü davranışları Şari bildirmeden ayırt edemez

E seçeneği yanlıştır. Eşariler'e göre, insan aklı iyi ve kötü davranışları ayırt edebilir, ancak Şâri'in mesajı olmadan doğru inançlara sahip olması mümkün değildir. Bu nedenle, insanların imanlarında mükemmeliyet Şâri'in mesajının varlığına bağlıdır.

Aşağıdakilerden hangisi ya da hangileri vaz olundukları manalar açısından yapılan lafız taksiminin içinde yer alır?

Lütfen bir ya da daha fazlasını seçin:

Mutlak

Mecaz

Has

Müşterek

Emir

Kinaye
A, B, C, D ve F seçenekleri vaz olundukları manalar açısından yapılan lafız taksiminin içinde yer alırken, E seçeneği bir emir kipini ifade etmektedir.

Hanefilere göre namazda Fatiha suresinin okunuşu ile ilgili anlatımlardan hangisi doğrudur?

Oa. Sübutu ve delaleti zanni naslarla sabit olmakla birlikte, bağlayıcılık bakımından mendubdan bir kademe yukan seviyede istendiğinden dolayı vacib olmuştur.

b. Bu hüküm sübutu kati, delaleti zanni bir nas ile sabit olmuştur.

C Bağlayıcılık bakımından en üst seviyede istenildiği halde, sübutu zanni, delaleti kat'i naslarla sabit olduğundan vacib olmuştur.

d Sübutu ve delaleti kat'i naslarla sabit olmakla birlikte, mükellefler bağlayıcılık açısından farza göre bir kademe alt seviyede istendiğinden dolayı vacib olmuştur.

e. Bağlayıcılık bakımından en üst seviyede istenildiği halde, delaleti kati olan meşhur hadislerle sabit olduğundan vacib olmuştur.

D seçeneği doğrudur. Hanefilere göre Fatiha suresi vaciptir. Mutlak vacip olmakla birlikte, bağlayıcılık bakımından farzdan bir kademe alt seviyede istenir. Sübutu ve delaleti kat'i naslarla sabit olmakla birlikte, mükellefler bağlayıcılık açısından farza göre bir kademe alt seviyede istendiği için vacip olmuştur.
